name: Dragon Ball Z: Budokai 2
description: Dop In.  Power Up.  Throw Down.   Prepare for the greatest Dragon Ball Z fighting game of all-time.  Lead Goku and his allies through Dragon World, in a thrilling single-player adventure to find the mystical Dragon Balls.  But beware: Buu is waiting, determined to destroy everything in his path.  Do you have what it takes to survive... and win?
